JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Dansktalende content moderator for  Social media platform søges til Dublin, Irland
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Har du is i maven til at se hvad en af verdens største social media platforms virkelig arbejder med hver dag? Hjælp os med at holde platformen ren for spam!

Do you want to enter a career of social media? 

Client served:

They are the leading destination for short-form mobile videos. Their mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. They are building a global community where users can create and share authentically, discover the world around them, and connect with others across the globe. They are also committed to keeping this community safe.

 

Role Overview

  • Conduct quality assessment work by ensuring and evaluating the quality delivery of the content reviewed in European markets.
  • Conduct root cause data analysis and summary.
  • Provide QA reports to content quality centre team members, and act as liaison with them to ensure consistent quality measurements throughout the operation.
  • Work closely with Local Operations and Safety teams, and act as escalation point of contact for policy related questions, issues, and solutions.

Your Profile

  • English as a working language and native level of Danish language skill.
  • 1 year of working experience in content moderation and quality analysis for online media content in a major tech company.
  • MS Excel, Google Spreadsheet, or other data analytical tool skills.
  • Deep understanding of European online safety, privacy, and expression issues.
  • Ability to work in rotational shifts 24/7.
  • Work eligibility in Ireland: EU passport, Stamp 4, etc.

The Offer                                                           

  • Permanent direct contract.
  • Dublin City Centre brand new office.
  • Remote on-boarding provided.
  • Exciting internal career opportunities.

Contact our recruiter today for more information.
